vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in Ownable.sol:
	- Version used: ['ABIEncoderV2', '^0.5.16']
	- Ownable.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.5.16
	- Ownable.sol#4 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2
